title: Turkey and Leek Soup
ingredients: ['700ml water', '200g uncooked pearl barley', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 medium onions, chopped', '1 large leek, chopped', '500g turkey mince or turkey breast', '4 pints beef stock', '300ml Chinese rice wine', '2 1/2 tablespoons ground coriander', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
